page.title: 16LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: There are a number of organised clubs and societies within the area including Cubs, Scouts, and Brownies, nearby there is the Walesby Forest Scout Camp. A number of local children belong to a variety of sporting clubs such as Judo, Karate and competitive swimming. Within Walesby there is also a riding school and a number of children take riding lessons on a regular basis. The adults in the villages participate in activities such afternoon classes at the church hall and some evening classes are run under the auspices of the Dukeries Community College. There is also a newly formed Women's Institute in Walesby, where there are also strong soccer and cricket teams.
